statements: DELETE FROM influencer_sentiment_analysis WHERE influencer_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM influencer_sentiment_analysis WHERE influencer_id = 1 AND sentiment_score > 0.5;
DELETE FROM influencer_sentiment_analysis WHERE engagement_rate < 0.3 AND influencer_name LIKE 'John%';
DELETE FROM comments WHERE influencer_id = '137c0590-40fa-46ee-883f-0fb47bccd099' AND created_at <= '2021-12-31';
DELETE FROM influencers WHERE engagement_rate < 2.5 OR followers_count > 100000;
DELETE FROM influencer_comments WHERE comment_id = 100 AND influencer_id = 50;
DELETE FROM influencer_engagement WHERE engagement_id = 200 AND influencer_id = 75;
DELETE FROM influencer_engagement WHERE engagement_id = 100 AND likes > 100;
